Installation¶

Requirements¶

scola is compatible with python 3.4 or newer. We recommend using pip for installation. If you do not have pip, you can instead install scola from source.

We have tested scola on Ubuntu and CentOS.

Todo

Check compatibility to Mac and Windows when I have time to do it

Installation with pip¶

  1. Upgrade pip to the latest

  2. Install scola with pip.

    pip3 install scola

    If you don’t have a root access, try –user flag:

    pip3 install --user scola

Installation from source¶

  1. Download the source from GitHub.

  2. Move to the top directory, i.e., /scola

  3. Type

    python setup.py install
